channel.title: Love to travel? Let's connect!
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I'm Alejandra -
Flywallet is my baby: a fintech designed to make frequent international travel affordable and secure.
@flywallet on IG
No matter how many countries you want to visit, flywallet makes sure you save enough every month to afford all your flights when the prices are at their lowest.
I'd love to hear your feedback on my product, answer any questions, collaborate, and network with fellow travel lovers.
Happy New Year! :partying_face:
